The image purporting to show the: WelcomeRefugees promotion from Starbucks, which included the claim about free drink upgrades for customers who provided the name "Aloha Snackbar" to their baristas.
The messages posted on the r: The_Donald section of Reddit encouraging others to spread the image on social media.
The comparison with a genuine Starbucks: which revealed that the hoax advertisement had substituted its own text.
The visual error in the hoax advertiseme: specifically the missing lower half of the letter "y" in the word "say."
